name: Revolutionizing Crypto Wallet UX: A Glimpse into the Future
description: The talk will explore the role of crypto wallet UX in driving mass adoption. We will cover advancements in Passkeys, the transformative potential of Interchain Accounts for cross-chain asset management, and the concept of cross-chain composability. Attendees will also gain insights into the latest UX-related Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs).

speakers.bio: Founder at Evmos, CEO at Altiplanic. Previously Federico built the reference implementation of Ethermint, the IBC Protocol and Cosmos SDK as a Core Protocol Engineer at Interchain, Tendermint, and Ethermint.
